summary.span: 实现 类的自定义持久性格式。

span.span: Implements a custom persistence format for the class.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 服务器控件可以通过使用自己的控件生成器来实现自定义的持久性格式。ASP.NET server controls can implement customized persistence formats by using their own control builder. 这是通过创建控件生成器类并向类添加控件生成器特性来完成的。This is done by creating a control builder class and adding a control builder attribute to the class. 在分析和编译页面时，将使用控件生成器对象。Control builder objects are used when the page is parsed and compiled. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [实现自定义持久性](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c73e2402(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Implementing Custom Persistence](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c73e2402(v=vs.100)).

span.span: Implementing Custom Persistence

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由 ASP.NET 页框架在分析期间调用，不应在代码中直接调用。This method is called by the ASP.NET page framework during parsing and is not intended to be called directly in your code.

span.span: is not a object.
